subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jon Lester pitched three-hit ball into the seventh inning, David Ortiz broke open a scoreless game with a two-run homer in the seventh and the Boston Red Sox beat the Athletics, 5-0, on Wednesday in Oakland.
snippet: Jon Lester pitched three-hit ball into the seventh inning, David Ortiz broke open a scoreless game with a two-run homer in the seventh and the Boston Red Sox beat the Athletics, 5-0, on Wednesday in Oakland.
